title: Last chance to get a one-year Sam’s Club Membership for $20
description:
Cyber Monday is full of great deals, but few will pay you back the same way a Sam’s Club membership will. We’ve offered a one-year membership for 60% off at just $20, but that offer only runs through 11:59 pm PT on December 3, so it’s your last chance!

Sam’s Club is a leading wholesale club, offering extraordinary value on everyday items from groceries and furniture to clothing and electronics. It also offers unique perks like di
